13.ABOUT: Apollo IoT is the first and only artificial intelligence-supported, cloud-based digital energy management platform in Turkey, specializing in end-to-end monitoring and control of energy. It provides technical and financial analysis, optimization, and future consumption/cost forecasting for all types of energy expenses of businesses. Moreover, it enables the tracking of sustainability reports and goals on the same platform. In line with this, Apollo meets the needs of various departmenance and accounting to procurement, production planning, and sustainability, through advanced data analysis and a user-friendly interface on a single platform. Under the scope of Energy Management & Optimization, Apollo IoT is the only platform that allows tracking of energy not only in terms of consumption but also in terms of cost. Therefore, it enables real-time verification and control of electricity bills and all energy expenses. It prevents your facility from incurring potential reactive penalties through future consumption and cost forecasting. Through artificial intelligence, it anticipates extra energy costs by offering you the most advantageous tariff every month based on your consumption. It provides instant energy management and real-time energy monitoring with no investment and hardware costs, thanks to its integration with electricity distribution companies. Under the scope of Efficiency & Sustainability, With the world's first energy and carbon benchmarking feature, Apollo enables the comparison of your facility's energy intensity and carbon emissions with the industry and other facilities, allowing the management of all facilities' energies according to ISO 50001 without investment costs. It autonomously calculates the required r2 calculations for ISO 50001. By presenting all tracking and reports on a single digital platform, it eliminates human error and ensures operational efficiency.

14.PRODUCT_NAME: Ludis Analytics Data and Insights Platform
14.ABOUT:
Make your data science team more efficient with the Ludis Analytics platform, comprising of two major efficiency drivers. The first is a data science tool designed to free up time for data science teams by automating the data engineering processes of intake, cleaning, and ingestion of data. The second is a feature that allows teams to write algorithms/code (with Python or R) or use premade templates to create applications and insight reports. The applications and insight reports creaomatically update and sync, so users can check back at any time to receive the most recent results.
 

 While we can work with all sorts of data sources and formats, our current customers are focused in healthcare and sports data and invoicing.
CATEGORIES: Data Science and Machine Learning Platforms

15.ABOUT:
OpenBlender’s proprietary technology is the only one to enable data scientists to efficiently enrich their machine learning models with meaningful external data from any source (variables from news, social media, financial markets, weather, demographics, etc.) to greatly improve performance. OpenBlender automatically profiles, cleans and transforms structured and unstructured (text) data into a common numeric format ready for ML consumption. Then, users blend their datasets with oth source that overlap in time or location, transparently adding many new variables to their models.

Data is pulled into a Python or R dataframe via open-sourced libraries and an API, which also applies to private data from disparate sources from the customer’s data warehouse.

Main use cases:
Demand and sales forecasting
Supply chain management
Marketing analytics
Risk management
Quantitative modeling
IoT and location analytics

1.ABOUT:
E6013 AWS A5.1 E6013 ISO2560-A-E38 0 R1 12 GB/T 5117 E4313 Approved by: ABS CCS LR CE Description: It is a rutile type general purpose electrode for all positional welding. Suitable for welding of low carbon steel structure, especially for the welding of thin plate steel with short discontinuous weld and requirement of smooth welding pass. AC & DC. Welding Position: Diameters: 1.6mm,2.0mm, 2.5mm, 3.2mm, 4.0mm, 5.0mm. Typical Mechanical Properties: Tensile st.ength(MPa): 490
 Yield stress(MPa): 396
 Elongation (%): 26
 Impact values(≥47J/-20℃): 82
 

 Typical Chemical Compositon:
 C Mn P S Si Ni Cr Mo V
 0.08 0.43 0.026 0.021 0.21 0.04 0.011 0.007 0.009
 

 Welding Current: (AC/DC+)
 Diameter(mm) 2.5 3.2 4.0 5.0
 Current/A F/H 60-90 80-130 150-190 180-250
 Current/A V/OH 50-80 80-110 130-170 --
 

 Note:
 No need to bake before using, but please bake 30-60 minutes in 150℃ if the electrodes is humid.

2.ABOUT:
With our flagship solution "TP Management Tool" you can calculate Transfer Prices in simple but especially in complex supply chains for all products and trading partner relations, highly automated, according to a smart rule engine which covers tax/ TP methods, customs tariffs, anti-dumping rules and more. With our automated embedded forecasting engine on product level you can calculate prices ex-ante and steer more precisely towards target margins. Ideally you can completely avoid year end adju.tments. In case you may still need such year end adjustments, we are able drill them down on a single invoice and material level for much more efficient customs declarations. 
Due to a powerful data cleaner and TP specific data modeler, the solution offers you ERP agnostic ready-to-use-data. Therefore, we can consume data from SAP R/3, SAP S/4 HANA and non-SAP systems. No need to waste time for collecting, structuring and validating data.
Finally, this solution solves the practical issue that years later in tax audits no one needs to bother colleagues or to access “old” systems or to extract archived data in order to prove tax authorities how Transfer Prices have been calculated and why they are at arm’s length.

5.ABOUT: Over the last few years, ERP solution providers have continued to innovate, finding ways to use cloud computing and platform as a service (PaaS) to offer businesses the same bespoke feel of a siloed ERP with the affordability and flexibility of SaaS. Using the cloud platform as a service approach, businesses can create a flexible, open-ended space that’s designed to both meet their computing and planning needs today and grow with them into the future. That platform creates opportunia and functional integration across the board, meaning that the best, most up-to-date SaaS tools can now be leveraged in a way that provides the simple navigation and unified user experience of a custom-built in-house ERP.

6.ABOUT:
ScreenMix Screen Recorder by Mixilab provides an easy, uncomplicated way of recording your desktop's screen and webcam sessions. Excellent for games and video stream recording, product demos, tutorials, webcam chats, and more! If you want to control your privacy by recording and showing only specific areas of your screen, the app's custom area recording feature allows you to do just that in a snap! Otherwise, its full display recording allows you to record and share everything thn your PC screen.
 

 ScreenMix by Mixilab also has a delayed recording feature that allows you to start your recording more comfortably. With our low CPU and memory usage technology, you can control the quality and size of your output video. Thus, you can record your screen without overloading your PC's storage and processor.
 

 This simple yet powerful tool gives you the ability to record multiple monitors/displays at the same time, pointer activities, and even lets you track the size of your recording in real-time.
 If you're a fan of shortcuts, ScreenMix can be quickly fired up and powered down with Hot Keys: 'Alt+R' and 'Alt+S', respectively.
 

 What's more? ScreenMix Screen Recorder allows you to edit your recorded videos with our top-rated, super-easy video editor, Animotica. That way, your recorded videos will be more exciting and professional.
 

 We're going to improve this app with further releases. Green Screen (Chroma Key) feature will allow users to remove video background while webcam recording is coming soon! 
 

 With a free trial, you can try this excellent product right now! Just give this simple video capture software a shot, and you'd probably never look at any other screen recorder!

8.ABOUT: ElasticWebinar is an all-in-one platform designed to provide businesses with everything they need to create and run effective automated webinars. The platform offers a range of features that include registration pages for webinars, comprehensive email marketing, video hosting, and analytics. By using ElasticWebinar, businesses can streamline their webinar processes and simplify their marketing efforts. The interactive and automated features offered by ElasticWebinar, such as polls, os, chat, and many more can help businesses engage their audience and create a more interactive webinar experience. With ElasticWebinar, businesses can customize the look and feel of their webinar player, add their colors and other branding elements to the registration page, and use a custom domain for their webinar links. This means that businesses can create a fully branded and professional-looking webinar experience for their audience. ElasticWebinar provides detailed analytics and reporting features that allow businesses to track the performance of their webinars and gain insights into attendee behavior. This includes analytics per attendee, which can help businesses understand how individual attendees interact with their webinar content and identify areas for improvement.
